name: Ext_R4_ServiceRequest_locationReference
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ServiceRequest.locationReference for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.locationReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: A reference to the the preferred location(s) where the procedure should actually happen. E.g. at home or nursing day care center.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.locationReference` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.location`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.locationReference` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.location`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.locationReference` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.location`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
